short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shift the pitch or speed of any video you watch on YouTube and download and preview the modified version as an MP3 after!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you in need of a product that offers full customizability of any YouTube video being played, all within the comforts of your own browser?

Features
✅ High quality and accurate pitch transposing with discrete values for ease
✅ Modify video playback speed using an accurate slider or number values
✅ Produces mp3 output in your browser to preview
✅ Downloadable output
✅ Progress bar and play button

Future Plans
-Video modification via BPM
-Live changes 
-Multi App support (Spotify, SoundCloud, etc...)
